keyEvents.title: Crashes into Marineford
keyEvents.description: The stolen Marine battleship, carrying Luffy and the Impel Down escapees, crashes into the battlefield at Marineford after falling from a frozen tsunami wave.
keyEvents.significance: Delivers the escaped prisoners to the war zone, marking the first mass breakout from Impel Down arriving at the battlefield.

description: A Marine battleship that was captured by the Impel Down escapees. Jinbe used Fish-Man Karate to launch Crocodile, Mr. 1, and Buggy aboard the vessel, where they took control. The ship was then used to transport the escaped prisoners toward Marineford.
